Consider the case where there is an existing WPFsystem which is comprised of multiples screens (PAGES) each containing numerous UserControls.

Can WPF Pages have PRISM Regions defined in them?
Will the traditional WPF navigation work using PRISM regions and modules?

If NOT how would you replace such navigation using the PRISM mechanism for loading in Views from Modules?

If SO would it  to be possible to get and example of how to load a View from a Module into a Region in a Page when the page is loaded?
I am having trouble figuring out how to have a mutli-screen system, as with traditional WPF it was easy to go from page to page but I have found a world of pain when it came to loading modules dynamically upon navigation to a new page.

Any help / advise will be very much appreciated!

Thanks a million.

Steven H.
